sources.title: Dynamite (1949) WILLIAM GARGAN
sources.description:
Stars: William Gargan, Virginia Welles, Richard Crane 
Director: William H. Pine

Demolition workers are trapped in a tunnel with tons of TNT set to explode in this action packed thriller!

sources.title: Dynamite (1949) Drama Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Two-fisted hard-rock blasters...facing death for fame and glory!  Gunner is a veteran at working with dynamite, and is working for Jake. He becomes romantically interested in Jake's daughter Mary.
 
Director: William H. Pine
Writer: Milton Raison 
Stars: William Gargan, Virginia Welles, Richard Crane|

metadata.Plot: Gunner Peterson is a veteran dynamite man working for Jake and is romantically interested in Jake's daughter Mary. Johnny Brown, son of Nellie Brown who operates a boarding house, finds college too tame after his stint with a demolition squad in the army, and decides to quit. Getting a job with Jake, he is soon resented by Gunner when he tries to introduce some new methods and also starts showing an interest in Mary. A truck loaded with dynamite gets away from Hard Rock Mason and the loss of the truck causes Jake to have to borrow money from Nellie to keep his business going. Hard Rock is killed in a blast which Gunner decides was his fault, since he wouldn't listen to Johnny's ideas about how to set the charge, and he leaves. Later, when Johnny is testing charges, there is an unexpected blast and he is trapped in the tunnel.
metadata.Actors: William Gargan, Virginia Welles, Richard Crane
